すべての実装されたインタフェース:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
直系の既知のサブクラス:
EnhancedButton
public class RolloverButton
extends javax.swing.JButton

If you wish to have rollovers on your buttons, use this class. Unlike the Swing rollover support, this class works outside of JToolBars, and does not require undocumented client property hacks or JDK1.4-specific API calls.

Note: You should not call setBorder() on your buttons, as they probably won't work properly.

バージョン:
$Id: RolloverButton.java 21831 2012-06-18 22:54:17Z ezust $
